    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnActionModeFinishedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnActionModeStartedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnCreatePanelMenuListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnMenuItemSelectedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnPreparePanelListener

    public class MainActivity
extends com.actionbarsherlock.app.SherlockFragmentActivity
    Main activity where all the fragment will be placed. Manage the screen rotation and the back-button feature to allow the user navigate through the app.
    Since:
    2014-10-08
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jose Garcia

      • replaceFragment

        public static void replaceFragment(android.support.v4.app.Fragment fragment,
                   java.lang.String tag,
                   boolean backStack)
        Replace the current fragment with the fragment passed as parameter. This method is static to allow other fragment change themselves. Add to backStackFragment the tag passed as parameter.
        Parameters:
        fragment - Fragment that will be displayed.
        tag - Tag associated to the fragment.
        backStack - True if the fragment will be added to the back stack.

      • displayView

        public void displayView(int position)
        Change the fragment displayed on the activity according the parameter received. This method is called each time that the user press a button on the menu.
        Parameters:
        position - Position of the element tapped on the menu.

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        This method is called each time that the user press back button. Remove the last element of backStackFragment or finish the app if there's not elements to remove.
        Overrides:
        onBackPressed in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
